attributes.action: Gov to stop rejecting petitions for which is politically inconvenient for them.
attributes.additional_details: We understand that petitions are sometimes unlawful and ridiculous, but some petitons are meaningful to our families, friends & our future. We are asking our government to review carefully all rejected petitions and to take into account the wishes of the people of the United kingdom.
attributes.background: We, the People of the United kingdom, are asking our government to stop rejecting petitions that is politically inconvenient for them.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like a specific change to the rules for petitions, you could start a petition asking for that. You can find the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help#standards
